sources.title: The Dentist (1932)
sources.description: An unconventional dentist deals with patients in slapstick fashion. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-dentist-1932/

metadata.Plot: After preliminaries with ice and golf, dentist Fields turns to the problems of his patients. He wrestles one woman all over the office during an extraction. One man is so heavily bearded he can't find the man's mouth and uses a shotgun to flush out birds.
metadata.Actors: W.C. Fields, Marjorie Kane, Arnold Gray
